content.description:
This Thusness climbs a slightly overhung arete via awkward movement.

Sit start with a small edge at the arete with a left hand and a right hand undercling on the face. From there, stand up (awkward), slap the left hand up the arete to a pinch edge, stick a dyno to the pocket with the right hand (fun), follow to the lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is good, but there is a rock and tree just left of the fall zone.
content.location: It climbs the east side of Fissionary's southeast arete.

content.description: Sit start matched on the shelf. From there, place a heel, crank up through edges to the lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pad. It has a great landing though.
content.location: It climbs the southwest arete of Fissionary.

content.description: Stand start matched on underclings. From there, gain a right hand edge, follow to a left hand pocket, reach the lip, and pull on top.
content.protection: A pad will do. The landing is great.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Fissionary.

content.description: Stand with a left hand on the arete and a palm on the face. From there, use the arete to ascend the slab to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad or two. It has a good landing, but there is a rock just below the arete.
content.location: It climbs the west side of Fissionary's northwest arete.

content.description: Sit start with your choice of edge. From there, work straight up through edges and pockets to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is good, but there is a rock that sits directly to the right of the problem.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Fissionary.

content.description: Stand start with a left hand crimp and a low left toe. From there, push off the ground with the right foot and gain a diagonal right hand edge that can be pinched, follow to a left hand pocket, then to the lip, and use the bumps to pull on top.
content.protection: A pad will work. The landing is perfect.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Fissionary.
